text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump Yes bc we deserve to know why the US was criminally unprepared, why there is a shortage of #PPEs, #Ventilators #N95Masks when we had 4 months notice. Why did you call #COVID19 a hoax? Why do you want 250k ppl dead? You’re a murderer and want let go. Hell NO!!!
